detail_desc: Pull-on, ankle-length trousers in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist and side pockets in a loose fit with tapered legs.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset and a string back.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a rounded collar, buttons at the top and long, voluminous sleeves finishing with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers for added volume. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, jersey-lined wrapover hood, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short polo-neck top in viscose jersey with long sleeves.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a small stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lace yoke and sleeves.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Top in airy modal jersey with a small embroidered detail at the top, extra long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.

Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pin-tucks at the top and short sleeves. Concealed fastening at the top and a seam at the waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-in tie belt. Satin lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, decorative drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined in pile.
Top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in airy, pattern-weave cotton with inset lace sections and a V-neck front and back with a wide lace trim. Dropped shoulders and short raglan sleeves with narrow cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print motif on the front.
Boxy-style top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn in turn-ups.
High-waisted shorts in washed denim with embroidery front and back and a button fly. Coin pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short jumper in a chunky-knit cotton blend with hole-patterned details. Ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, tapered sleeves.
Lace dress with a pleated skirt and double-layered top. Short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder, sleeveless top in a soft rib knit with a sweetheart neckline and straight-cut back.
Short, fitted dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Platform mules with a braided jute trim around the soles and a wide, twisted foot strap. Platform front approx. 2 cm, heel 4 cm.

Oversized, double-breasted trenchcoat in a cotton weave with notch lapels and shoulder tabs with a decorative button. Side pockets with a decorative flap, a detachable belt with a buckle at the waist, and a single back vent. Unlined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, long legs and press-stud fastenings.
Iron-on fabric patch to patch and repair garments. Size approx. 12 cm.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a turtle neck, seam under the bust, short, elbow-length sleeves. and a rounded hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter 7.5 cm.
High-waisted jeggings in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a square neckline, long sleeves, buttons down the front and a peplum at the hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke at the back, long, cuffed sleeves, and a rounded hem.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and gathered seams at the shoulders and waist for a gentle draped effect. Gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam with narrow elastication at the waist.
Wide, ankle-length jeans in washed, lightweight cotton denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Pull-on trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and a back pocket. Relaxed fit with tapered legs.
Henley top in soft, fine-knit cotton containing some cashmere with a button placket and long sleeves.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and ties at one side. Seam with narrow elastication below the bust. Unlined.

Weekend bag in grained imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top. One zipped inner compartment and studs on the bottom. Lined. Size approx. 21x35x48 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with hole-knit sections at the front and down the sleeves. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in airy linen slub jersey with a gentle V-neck and extra-long sleeves.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Long jacket in a sturdy cotton weave with hand-embroidered stitching, lapels, a wrapover with a narrow tie, side pockets and high slits in the sides.
Straight-cut top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a motif on the front, cut-out sections on the shoulders and short raglan sleeves. Longer and rounded at the back.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.

Jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck and frill-trimmed sewn-in wrapover at the top. Narrow double shoulder straps that cross at the back, a concealed zip in the side, an elasticated seam at the waist and straight, ankle-length legs. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in checked twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.
Long-sleeved jumper in rib-knit cotton with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck tunic in an airy weave with pleats at the front, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short, sleeveless dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey. V-neck with decorative lacing and a frill trim that continues over the shoulders, and an elasticated seam under the bust. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
High-waisted trousers in sturdy, stretch twill with a slight sheen. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and slim, flared legs with a seam at the front and a concealed zip at the hems.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a decorative seam front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Short, high-waisted shorts in a patterned viscose weave with pleats at the top, wide elastication at the back of the waist, and side pockets.
Shirt in soft, lightweight flannel with chest pockets and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Set with a bracelet and pair of earrings in metal with narrow chains. Bracelet in an adjustable length of 16-20 cm. Length of earrings 13 cm.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Mules in imitation leather with pointed toes. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather.

Lightly padded jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Diagonal zip down the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Soft inner top with functional fasteners for easier nursing access and an elasticated hem.
Quilted puffer gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and discreet pockets in the side seams. Recycled polyester lining.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Suede sandals with a decorative bow at the front, shimmering metallic details and an ankle strap with a hook and loop tab. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short, T-shaped metal necklace with sparkly stones. Adjustable length approx. 31-39 cm.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a deep V-neck. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a wide, elasticated hem. Medium support.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frills around the neckline and sleeves.
